root.static-content:
<style type="text/css">
.loginuser { display: block; margin-top: 5px; overflow: hidden; padding: 2px 0 10px; text-decoration: none; width: 100%; } .loginuser h2 { font-size: 14px; margin: 0; } .loginuser a { display: block; margin: 2px 0 0 95px; padding-left: 20px; } .loginuser img { margin: 0 5px 0 0; padding: 2px; } .loginuser:hover { background: #CED9E2; } .express_login { background: url("/html/icons/login.png") no-repeat; } .public_pages { background: url("/html/themes/classic/images/common/view_tasks.png") no-repeat; }</style>
<form action="/web/guest/home" method="post" name="loginadmin">
 <input name="p_p_id" type="hidden" value="58" /> <input name="p_p_lifecycle" type="hidden" value="1" /> <input name="p_p_mode" type="hidden" value="view" /> <input name="p_p_state" type="hidden" value="maximized" /> <input name="_58_struts_action" type="hidden" value="/login/login" /> <input name="_58_login" type="hidden" value="bruno" /> <input name="_58_password" type="hidden" value="bruno" />
 <div class="loginuser" title="Login: bruno@liferay.com, Password: bruno">
  <div class="user-profile-image" style="padding-right: 4px; float: left;">
   <img alt="" class="avatar" src="/image/user_portrait?screenName=bruno&companyId=10160&t=1228845375900" width="80" /></div>
  <h2>
   Bruno (Admin)</h2>
  <div>
   The admin has full control over the entire portal, allowing modification and creation of users, communitities, and roles. <a class="public_pages" href="/web/bruno">View Bruno's public page.</a> <a class="express_login" href="#" onclick="document.loginadmin.submit();return false;">Login as Bruno.</a></div>
 </div>
</form>
<form action="/web/guest/home" method="post" name="loginrich">
 <input name="p_p_id" type="hidden" value="58" /> <input name="p_p_lifecycle" type="hidden" value="1" /> <input name="p_p_mode" type="hidden" value="view" /> <input name="p_p_state" type="hidden" value="maximized" /> <input name="_58_struts_action" type="hidden" value="/login/login" /> <input name="_58_login" type="hidden" value="richard" /> <input name="_58_password" type="hidden" value="richard" />
 <div class="loginuser" title="Login: richard@liferay.com, Password: richard">
  <div class="user-profile-image" style="padding-right: 4px; float: left;">
   <img alt="" class="avatar" src="/image/user_portrait?screenName=richard&companyId=10160&t=1228845375871" width="80" /></div>
  <h2>
   Richard Publisher</h2>
  <div>
   Richard has article submission rights for the content management system. <a class="public_pages" href="/web/richard">View Richard's public page.</a> <a class="express_login" href="#" onclick="document.loginrich.submit();return false;">Login as Richard.</a></div>
 </div>
</form>
<form action="/web/guest/home" method="post" name="loginmichelle">
 <input name="p_p_id" type="hidden" value="58" /> <input name="p_p_lifecycle" type="hidden" value="1" /> <input name="p_p_mode" type="hidden" value="view" /> <input name="p_p_state" type="hidden" value="maximized" /> <input name="_58_struts_action" type="hidden" value="/login/login" /> <input name="_58_login" type="hidden" value="michelle" /> <input name="_58_password" type="hidden" value="michelle" />
 <div class="loginuser" title="Login: michelle@liferay.com, Password: michelle">
  <div class="user-profile-image" style="padding-right: 4px; float: left;">
   <img alt="" class="avatar" src="/image/user_portrait?screenName=michelle&companyId=10160&t=1228845375823" width="80" /></div>
  <h2>
   Michelle Editor</h2>
  <div>
   Michelle has control over the staging and layout of all articles as well as publishing rights for workflow and the content management system. <a class="public_pages" href="/web/michelle">View Michelle's public page.</a> <a class="express_login" href="#" onclick="document.loginmichelle.submit();return false;">Login as Michelle.</a></div>
 </div>
</form>
<form action="/web/guest/home" method="post" name="loginkendra">
 <input name="p_p_id" type="hidden" value="58" /> <input name="p_p_lifecycle" type="hidden" value="1" /> <input name="p_p_mode" type="hidden" value="view" /> <input name="p_p_state" type="hidden" value="maximized" /> <input name="_58_struts_action" type="hidden" value="/login/login" /> <input name="_58_login" type="hidden" value="kendra" /> <input name="_58_password" type="hidden" value="kendra" />
 <div class="loginuser" title="Login: kendra@liferay.com, Password: kendra">
  <div class="user-profile-image" style="padding-right: 4px; float: left;">
   <img alt="" class="avatar" src="/image/user_portrait?screenName=kendra&companyId=10160&t=1228845375887" width="80" /></div>
  <h2>
   Kendra Regular User</h2>
  <div>
   Kendra is a user with minimum rights within the portal. <a class="public_pages" href="/web/kendra">View Kendra's public page.</a> <a class="express_login" href="#" onclick="document.loginkendra.submit();return false;">Login as Kendra.</a></div>
 </div>
</form>
